<h1>
  Todo application
</h1>

Simple todo application built with [Gatsby](https://www.gatsbyjs.org/) framework.

[VIEW DEMO](http://165.22.213.22:9000/)

##  Purpose

* Learn the Gatsby framework by building simple app
* Learn deploying the Gatsby todo app to [Digitalocean](https://www.digitalocean.com/) server.
* Learn [NGINX](https://www.nginx.com/)


## Author

[Niraj Rajgor](https://nirajrajgor.com/)
